name: Lost Object In Pictures
description:
Join with the millions of other players and look for hidden objects. Are you ready to find all the Hidden Objects in each picture?

Features
• USE hints!
• NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED to play!
• BEAUTIFUL HIGH RESOLUTION GRAPHICS look great on any phone or tablet!
• HOURS of searching for objects!
• FIND hundreds of hidden items in each picture!
• BEST hidden object adventure game!
• PLAY for FREE NOW!
